alert.note: Alert for Pennington; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:31AM MDT until July 05 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM MDT FOR HAAKON...SOUTHERN ZIEBACH...EAST CENTRAL MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 930 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8 to 2 miles north of Bridger, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cherry Creek, Milesville, South Eagle Butte, Bridger, Howes, Kirley, Red Scaffold, Billsburg, Takini, Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads, Grindstone Butte, Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8 and southwestern Cheyenne River Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
